gcalendr 0.1.1.9000
  • Reference

Reference

Read a google calendar

Get a list of calendars and read events from a calendar

get_gcal_list()

Get list of calendars from google.

get_gcal_events()

Retrieve google calendar events.

Authenticating

Take explicit control of the Google auth status or examine current state

gcalendr_auth()

Authorize gcalendr

gcalendr_deauth()

Suspend authorization

gcalendr_token()

Produce configured token

gcalendr_auth_config() gcalendr_api_key() gcalendr_oauth_app()

View or edit auth config

gcalendr_has_token()

Is there a token on hand?

Calendar API spec

Info about or check input against the Calendar API spec

gcalendr_endpoints()

List Calendar endpoints

Programming to the Calendar API

Low-level functions used internally and made available for programming

request_generate()

Build a request for the Google Calendar API

No longer used

These functions were available in earlier versions of the package but now deprecated

get_google_token()

Defunct.
